name: This Is IGAD!
description:
This Is IGAD is a 4 player chaotic local co-op game which represents some of the cornerstones of the IGAD education. Team up with your friends to see if you can make it through all 4 blocks  whilst learning more about yourself and your friends.

Controls:

- Play with an XBOX controller.

- Left thumbstick for moving around.

- A for picking up items.

- X for processing items.

- Start button for a pause menu.

Project context:

This game is made by a group of 13 students who worked 8 weeks tirelessly to deliver the best they could in the short time frame that was provided. This happened within the IGAD education at the NHTV Breda university. 

The task of the team was to create a game that would teach new year 1 students what the IGAD education is about and how some of the core aspects work in a fun and approachable way.

This project ended up winning 2 internal awards;

1. Best Game Design on a Year 2 project - Teacher Award 

2. Best Game of Year 2 - Audience Award
